titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices, a proclamation whereas His Majesty by his royal proclamation of the seventh day of July last ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lords Justices.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Other title information taken from first two lines of text.
"Given at the court at Whitehall, the ninth day of August, 1698. In the tenth day of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
